unnormalised: Oi, ek urgent prashn! Konnak kiteim mahit asa Nehru Place-ant bore quality-che cotton kapodd khoim mellta mhonn? Mhaka kurta korpak lagun sumar 5 meters zai asa. Ani eka dadleak kurta-chi standard lambai sumar 42 inches asta, barem na? Ani ₹500-₹800 ghetolea bore tailor-acho suchovnni konnak korunk zata? Dhanyavad!
normalised: Arey, ekdom lagich ulo! Konak tori mahit asa kai Nehru Place-ar bori quality-chi cotton-chi kapod kiteam meuta mhunn? Mhaka sumar ponch meter kurta-k zai asa. Ani, ek standard lambai dadleanchea kurta-k, sumar challis ani don inch asta, sori? Ani konn sangonk zata kai boro tailor konn asa zo rupiya panchshe to rupiya aattshe gheto sitaunk? Dhanyavad!
